alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 9:38PM CDT until April 08 at 7:25PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant affecting Elmore and Montgomery Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tallapoosa River Basin and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday afternoon, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 28.6 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
